phrases: Just what I would expect from you.
The sewing class assignment was due today, was not it?
Well, I can talk to the teacher and
get an extension until after school.
I wish I could be like you.
So that is how I look in other people's eyes.
That is what I love about myself.
We are so glad we are in the same class as you!
It is all because of him!
Sis, you always dress so goofy.
Hey, what is wrong with this?
Are not there some major difference
That graceful image is just a facade.
Being sweet is a big lie.
In other words, I am just...the Queen of Vanity!
Sis, you are trying to strike a pose even when you are dressed like that...?
But you know, Sis' passion for
If it means being number one,
she will pull an all-nighter in a heartbeat.
To be the heroine of P.E.
she will not hesitate to do secret special training.
And to look even slightly more beautiful,
she goes to the trouble of researching beauty.
But at home you totally loaf around
and are a selfish, stubborn, spoiled brat.
Mmm, this grilled eggplant is good...l
It is like, You would really go that far to get people to admire you?!
If I cannot let things slide at home,
I am going to get exhausted!
Then why do not you just knock off the acting?
we do not even recognize you for a moment.
I mean, until last year she was in the same middle school as us.
Every time I saw her breezing through the halls it gave me the shivers.
Though once I got used to it,
She scatters her charm all over the neighborhood.
You have such an elegant daughter...
Yukino's put on an act in public ever since kindergarten.
how you can all stand to act normally.
Whenever they look at me with eyes full of respect and admiration...
There is a pervert among us.
I think being carefree is better,
even if it means being ordinary...
It is better than being a pervert, anyway.
But, Sis, you recently got an enemy, did not you?
I cannot let him beat me now!
I was able to keep on fooling the world just fine all the way up through middle school.
But then an enemy appeared for the first time.
The story goes back to the April Opening Ceremony.
And after I studied so hard...!
How could someone be better than me?!
I was planning on becoming the speaker and instantly dropping a bomb with my presence.
My plans for my high school debut are all screwed up.
Whoever's standing in the way of my plans must be some dreary, hard-core nerd!
The Representative Speaker for the Incoming Class, Arima Souichirou...
Just as I feared, he monopolized the attention of the entire class
This is the worst humiliation in all my 15 years.
So I have made up my mind!
I am going to defeat him no matter what!
And I have got to make everyone notice how wonderful I am!
In other words, what was supposed to be
your debut turned into his debut instead.
Sis, you would go that far to be the center of attention...?
Words of praise are the source of life energy!
they say he is nice, and good at sports...
I will never let him be number one again!
I will obstruct him again and again and again...
I will show that little mister rich-boy just how tough life can be!
Let us's not blame others for your own personal problems.
Should not you be thanking him for showing you that you are a big fish in a small pond...
Who would have thought that my sister could hate someone this much because of vanity.
one, two, one, two, one, two...
one, two, one, two, one, two...
You arrive pretty early every morning.
Great, I manage to run into the LAST guy I want to see first thing in the morning.
But it is going to take more than that to crack my impregnable mask.
You are in the Kendo Club right?
Yeah, every day from 6 in the morning
It is great that you can keep up with both practice and studying like that.
But you are so responsible, and smart too.
You are so efficient at your Academic Assembly duties...
I guess there are people like that when you get up to high school.
I have realized all over again how big the world is...
The nice partner you see before you is the woman who will ultimately send you to Hell!
I do not get this at all!
Hey, Arima, could you help me with this?
Oh, for this, you have to use the answers
for the discriminant and the coefficient.
Arima, show me too, would ya?
Why do not we form a group?
If you throw it with your hand it will go off course...
He just got off a shot.
I hear he is almost as good as the seniors in the Kendo Club.
Our school's one of the strongest in the prefecture, right?
He sure looks good in his uniform, does not he?
Then, as for the usage of tamae..., Arima.
I believe it is a future tense helping verb denoting humility, in the you and e forms.
Until now, being the center of attention...
Without him, I would be the one getting all the attention!
It is cold, being buried among the ranks of the average citizens.
Arima, you are a pain in the ass!
I will be the one who is going to
I have been pulling non-stop all nighters lately, studying to beat him down.
If I fall asleep here, I will play right into his hands.
I almost killed myseIf in a really lame way.
No one saw that, did they?
That was dangerous, so you should not do it.
God damn it, god damn it, god damn it, GOD DAMN IT!
So, that concludes this week's general meeting.
This school sure has a lot of Academic Assembly meetings.
I did not think it would be this tough.
But it means the students are being entrusted with governing themselves.
What kind of music do you listen to?
That profound, magnificent music appeals to the soul. * I actually love HIDEKI (jpop). *
I especially love his 2nd Piano Concerto.
I want to hear the version conducted by Karl Bohm, but I cannot seem to find it anywhere.
I have got that CD at home.
If you want, I will loan it to you sometime.
Man, is this guy spoiled or what!
It is right before midterms, so no practice for this week.
You take the Nanbu Subway Line, right?
Can I accompany you part of the way home?
Sis, play with us once in a while!
You have not played with us at all since entering high school!
He is so full of himseIf...
I am going to crush him no matter what!
She used to play with us all the time!
Besides, are not YOU the one who is carried away and all puffed up?
Why do you keep making such snide remarks?!
I studied like I was possessed.
Somehow it felt like my goal of being number one and getting all the attention...
I wonder what kind of face he will make?
I thought Arima was amazing, but you are something too.
I did not even notice until now.
It is been so long since I have heard these sounds of admiration...
Farewell to the old me who was forced to be something she was not.
And hello to the new me,
who will show her true self in the future to come!
But you are not going to have your way anymore.
From now on, surrounded by unfamiliar feelings...
You are the one who is going to experience the hell that I used to live in.
Try harder next time and make it into a real victory!
Now just show that face, twisted
in humiliation, in front of me!
I thought if I could just beat him, I would win...
I beat him, but I am not that happy...
Or more like, something is wrong.
If I think about it, the only one bent on grades and appearances was me.
Arima did not give a damn about that stuff from the start.
Even without ulterior motives for winning, people had recognized him anyway.
So he is the real thing.
I am ashamed that I am so different from the real thing...
Is not what I have been doing......deceiving people by
that I first started enjoying being praised by others?
You are such a responsible, good little girl.
I wanted to hear more of it.
If I could learn to do somersaults on the bars,
I wonder if I can surprise them some more?
If I could play the piano well...
If I was able to write kanji well...
If I got voted onto the Academic Committee...
If I got the highest grade on tests...
I am really a sucker for an audience.
If I had worked on freely
I tried to make myseIf out to be more than I really am, but all I got was exhaustion.
Trying to become some different kind of creature was just stupid...
I really do not want to face Arima.
Then I just should not come to school until the very last moment...
And then I kill time by studying...
I will go to the music room
Why does he always see me when I am being a moron?!
I am just an underdog anyway!
I want you to know that...I...Like you.
It feels so good to have someone tell you he is in love with you.
Sis, have not you always been popular?
The point is that this time it was Arima.
Who cares about winning or losing any more?
I mean, he fell for me.
In the game of love, the person who receives the love is the winner.
I turned him down, of course.
He walked away with this Lonesome look on his face.
I was sure you had a complex about him.
Well, I guess I did have one.
Sis, is not a complex another way to say......a longing for something
that you yourseIf can never be?
I guess his intelligence and nice,
popular personality give rise to the image
I have always been trying to approach
precisely what I thought of as the ideal...
a funny song and this manga.
I never thought of him that way!
Well, I already turned him down,
She is really still a kid.
You sure you are not coming?
It is a really cool movie.
Tsukino, the movie's going to start!
You do not sound very sorry!
Mom and Dad are out shopping...
There is only one Sunday a week.
Lounging around the house is definitely the way to go.
Why did I let my guard down just then?
I bet she forgot her umbrella after all.
and thought I would... drop it by...
What terrifyingly strong nerves and seIf-restraint.
He is a really admirable guy.
I bet I am the first
who has ever disturbed him this much.
I guess I will be satisfied for today
And Arima cleverly exploits that fact!
